entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.2°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
